occupation: Chief Operating Officer & CFO at Wedge Networks Inc.
headline: Chief Operating Officer & CFO at Wedge Networks Inc.
summary:
LEADERSHIP | STRATEGY | EXECUTION & RESULTS | COLLABORATION | THOUGHT LEADERSHIP

SENIOR LEADER - Surpasses expectations, uncovers and resolves key business hindrances. Builds collaboration to attain demanding goals and sharpen the competitive edge.

I have 25 years of cross functional multi-disciplinary leadership experience spanning operations, sales and financial matters. Determine, plans, initiates action and excitement. Questions the status quo. Swiftly devises and implements bold and sweeping strategies to enhance business growth. Consistently hits the ground running in new roles, producing exceptional results within a short period of time.

EXPERTISE & ACCOMPLISHMENTS
✔Wedge Networks Inc.
Senior executive providing cross functional multi-disciplinary leadership spanning operations, sales and financial matters leading 30+ professionals across North America, APAC and MENA. Accountable for company wide service delivery, client/stakeholder relationships, P&L, oversight and administration of Capex and Opex budgets. 
- Improved customer experience reducing product fulfillment and installation time by more than 50%.
- Pivoted business plan to target recurring revenue from licensing, royalty, and revenue sharing models.
- Implemented “Go-to-Market” strategy focused on technology integration resulting in commercial agreements with 6 strategic partners in under 2 years.
- Doubled revenue year-over-year for 3 consecutive years.
- Spearheaded North American sales growth leading to 8x growth in customer pipeline and initial sales to Government of Canada and multinational managed service provider (datto/Kaseya).
- Reduced year-over-year operating expenses by 25%+ and improved EBITDA operating results by 63%.
- Established criteria and implemented financial reporting and corporate governance framework to support requirements for audited financial statements from 2018 to present.
- Raised $10M in capital utilizing both debt and equity.
- Structured and managed processes resulting in more than $6.0M in grants and government funding.
- Strategically positioned Wedge from early stage/start-up company, navigating through the global pandemic, to receiving an offer from a global managed service provider to acquire the company.

-Introduced sales orientation and performance criteria/KPI’s reducing transaction completion times and costs by an average of 30%.
